text: The 1977 Omloop Het Volk was the 32nd edition of the Omloop Het Volk cycle race and was held on 5 March 1977. The race started and finished in Ghent. The race was won by Freddy Maertens. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 0" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 04" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 04" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 04" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 04" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 04" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 04" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 04" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 04" |} |} ==References== 1977 Omloop Het Nieuwsblad Omloop Het Nieuwsblad
